statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 40 \\ -25 \\ -30 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 48 \\ -29 \\ -36 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -176 \\ 110 \\ 132 \\ -22 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
